title: Code of Conduct
header: Welcome to our Code of Conduct
introduction: At Hashibis, we strive to create a respectful, inclusive, and safe community for all cannabis enthusiasts to maintain a positive environment.

rules.title: Respectful Communication
rules.content: Treat fellow community members with respect and kindness. Engage in constructive discussions and avoid any form of harassment, hate speech, or discriminatory language.

rules.title: Stay On Topic
rules.content: Keep your contributions relevant to the cannabis industry, cultivation, products, and related topics. Off-topic or unrelated discussions may be removed to ensure the community's focus remains intact.

rules.title: Share Accurate Information
rules.content: When sharing information or advice, ensure it is accurate, reliable, and well-sourced. Misinformation can be harmful and misleading to others.

rules.title: No Promotion of Illegal Activities
rules.content: Our platform promotes responsible and legal cannabis-related activities. Do not engage in discussions or promote activities that are illegal or against our terms of service.

rules.title: Respect Privacy
rules.content: Do not share personal information of others without their consent. Protect your own privacy and the privacy of fellow members.

rules.title: Report Violations
rules.content: If you come across content that violates our Code of Conduct or our terms of service, report it to our moderation team for review. We appreciate your help in maintaining a positive community.

rules.title: Be Open to Different Perspectives
rules.content: The cannabis community is diverse, and different opinions may arise. Approach discussions with an open mind and willingness to learn from others.

rules.title: No Spam or Self-Promotion
rules.content: Avoid spamming the community with self-promotional content. If you have a business, consider advertising options available on our platform.

rules.title: Respectful Debates
rules.content: Healthy debates are encouraged, but always maintain a respectful tone when disagreeing with others' opinions.

rules.title: Community Support
rules.content: Support fellow community members by providing guidance, answering questions, and sharing your experiences. Remember, we're all here to learn and grow together.
